body_html: Except for using a separate library, yes. Just check magic numbers instead: it would be a few lines of pure Python if we only had a tf.startswith op for strings, so adding tf.startswith is one way.
body_text: Except for using a separate library, yes.  Just check magic numbers instead: it would be a few lines of pure Python if we only had a tf.startswith op for strings, so adding tf.startswith is one way.
body: Except for using a separate library, yes.  Just check magic numbers instead: it would be a few lines of pure Python if we only had a `tf.startswith` op for strings, so adding `tf.startswith` is one way.
